alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fremont County through 230 PM MDT... At 156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Castle Gardens, which is also 30 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Fremont County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
